title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), overwriting the exported jar file for the second time triggers an out of sync message.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid triggering the out of sync message.
SR:
1. Open the directory (project) in the application.
2. Export the directory as a jar file.
3. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
4. Overwrite the exported jar file.
5. Repeat step 4 to trigger the out of sync message.
